 2018-02762018-03-12,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of JENNIFER PEREIRA of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of History, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective March 12, 2018.
